title: Mom of 2-year-old and infant rallies neighborhood to take down unfair HOA: 'She spent... a full summer taking down the HOA'
description: This is one dedicated Mama! Parents want only the best for their kids, and this Mom was no exception. You want your kid to go to the best school, have educational toys, and be surrounded by a great community of people. Having children can inspire parents to make the world a better place: the things they tolerated for themselves, like a lazy HOA, become intolerable once their precious children are in the mix. And in this Mom's case, once she learned the local HOA was taking her money without actually delivering results, her path forward was clear: it was time to join the HOA and get it fixed up herself. After that, read about the freshly fired employee who sabotaged a critically important project: "It needs to be 'basically ready' in 2 weeks."
author: Remy Millisky
